abstract.p: Regeneration Furniture sells used enamel-painted steel laboratory cabinets for kitchen use; photo (S)

block.p: YOU who mourn the passage of high tech, grieve no more. Jan Staller, a Manhattan artist, and Chris Miele, an owner of Regeneration Furniture, are selling enamel-painted steel laboratory cabinets that adapt to kitchen use. The 100 pieces -- used but in good condition, some with heat-resistant black epoxy counter tops -- include drawer and shelf units and sinks. The sleek cabinetry, in blue, gray-green, or blue and white, is $150 a running foot ($175 with counter top). By appointment, at Regeneration Furniture, 38 Renwick Street (Canal Street), SoHo; (212) 614-9577.
